verse: Again I saw all types of oppression that are done under the sun:
Then I saw that all toil and every skillful work come from one man’s envy of another. This also is vanity and like chasing the wind.
Again, I saw vanity under the sun:
Better is a poor and wise youth than an old and foolish king who will no longer be admonished.
For out of prison he has come to reign, even though he was born poor in the kingdom.
Then I saw all those who live and walk under the sun, along with the next youth who will arise in the king’s place.
There is no end of all the people, to all who were before them. Yet those who come later will not rejoice in him. Surely this also is vanity and chasing the wind.
